conversion_verification.notes: The view is still largely a top-down orthographic projection, lacking true 3D depth perception for walls and interior volume. Wall height is not visibly rendered.

detected_errors.description: The second image is still predominantly a 2D floor plan view, despite some shadows giving a slight illusion of depth. There is no visible wall height, and the viewing angle is pure top-down orthographic. This does not qualify as a true 3D transformation.

summary: The conversion failed to produce a true 3D model, as the output is essentially a 2D floor plan with shaded elements, lacking proper wall height and an angled perspective.
